sentence.Network_en: Calcium may aid in the prevention of colon cancer.

sentence.Network_cn: 他们对预防和初级护理极为重视。

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)it's easier to stop something happening in the first place than to repair the damage after it has happened

entry.def: To prevent something means to ensure that it does not happen.

example.ex: Further treatment  will prevent cancer from developing...
example.tran: 进一步的治疗将阻止癌症恶化。

entry.def: To prevent someone from doing something means to make it impossible for them to do it.

example.ex: He said this would prevent companies from creating new jobs...
example.tran: 他说这将使公司无法创造新的工作机会。

example.ex: Its nationals may be prevented from leaving the country...
example.tran: 其国民可能会被禁止出境。

sentences.sentence: "money was allocated to study the cause and prevention of influenza"

auth_sentence.res_content: Engaging men as role models and advocates for prevention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Engaging men as role models and advocates for prevention.

auth_sentence.content: Prevention, she said, costs less than treatment.

sentences.en: Prevention and cure are both attended to.
sentences.cn: 预防和治疗都有了着落。

means.word_mean: 治病不如防病；防患于未然是上策

sentences.en: Prevention is better than cure, so start looking after your heart now.
sentences.cn: 防病比治病好，所以从现在开始照顾好你的心脏。

sentences.en: Remember that prevention is better than cure, so brush your teeth at least twice a day and visit your dentist for regular check-ups.
sentences.cn: 记住， 预防胜于补救，所以每天至少要刷两次牙，并且要定期做牙科检查。
